rows.label: qst000701_msg0001
rows.name:
Ohhhh... There's gotta be someone
who can help... I don't wanna lose...

rows.label: qst000701_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh! Hey, you there!
Yeah, you!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0003
rows.name:
Listen, have you heard of this pale
beetle called the Snow-White Rhino?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0004
rows.name:
I've got a bet going with my mate
Leif to see who can find one first...

rows.label: qst000701_msg0005
rows.name:
But just recently, I heard
something awful.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0006
rows.name:
Apparently Leif asked this old guy
he knows to go find a Snow-White
Rhino beetle for him!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0007
rows.name:
I mean, sure, Seigle Fell is
dangerous for kids, but come on!
Seriously?! Unfair, right?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0008
rows.name: What do we think?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0009
rows.name: Agree it's unfair

rows.label: qst000701_msg0010
rows.name: Say Luchini should get his own beetle

rows.label: qst000701_msg0011
rows.name:
Right?
Seriously!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0012
rows.name:
That's why I want you to go and
fetch a Snow-White Rhino for me too!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0013
rows.name: This has just become a proxy war.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0014
rows.name:
If Leif's gonna use a mean trick
like this, then so will I.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0015
rows.name:
My mam's no help - she tells me not to
go anywhere dangerous, but then she
tells me not to let him beat me, too!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0016
rows.name:
Anyway, this is real lucky for me.
You'll help out, right?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0017
rows.name:
What?!
N-no way!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0018
rows.name:
Snow-White Rhinos live near
Seigle Fell, which is meant to be
really dangerous!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0019
rows.name:
Even grownups have got badly hurt
going there! If I went, I'd come back
in tiny little bits!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0020
rows.name:
What's with the face? Oh, so you
think I shouldn't have bet on it, then?
Is that it?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0021
rows.name: I had to, buddy!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0022
rows.name:
My mam always tells me, you can't
back down from a challenge...

rows.label: qst000701_msg0023
rows.name:
And once you've accepted one,
you do what it takes to win!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0024
rows.name:
So please! Please get a Snow-White
Rhino for me? Pretty please?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0025
rows.name: Awesome! Thanks!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0026
rows.name:
Snow-White Rhinos like to hang
about near Seigle Fell, down near
the tail end of Gula.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0027
rows.name:
Oh, but apparently they only come out
early in the morning...

rows.label: qst000701_msg0028
rows.name:
That's basically all I know. Eh, you'll
work it out I'm sure!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0029
rows.name:
I'll make sure to have some sort of
reward ready for you. Look forward
to it!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0101
rows.name: Didja find that Snow-White Rhino yet?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0102
rows.name:
You can find 'em near Seigle Fell,
towards Gula's tail.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0103
rows.name:
But be careful, 'cos they only come out
early in the morning.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0104
rows.name: Good luck!
